spots.name: Butcher Block Cafe
spots.description: Greasy spoon right next to Pepsi Company.  Has seating, breakfast, lunch, and dinner.

comments.comment: We love this place and always have.  I think they dose the employees with THC and sprinkle not an insignificant amount of crack on all the food!

It took us an hour to be sat, and then, when I sat down, I sat in gum.  This was actually fortunate, because our food didn't come for over an hour.  I was able to chew on some of the gum I sat in in the meantime.
I'd go back.  I was just trying this thing where everything I do must be perceived through a lens of mundanity.  I don't wanna get too up or too down.  I want life at a medium pace, all the time.
These buns is sticky!
Beer a little too bubly.

Hipster mindset oozing through the woodworks.
I hate beer, but I love Black Shirts!
Craft beer is all the rage!
Nowhere to park.  I wanna drive drunk!
Beer's not bubly enough.
I'm like president and stuff.
Black shirts are fer pussays!

spots.name: Dingle's Berries
spots.description: Really quite juicy berries.  The flavor's a bit off though. : (

comments.comment: My oh my!  These berries are a little dry.
